languages.text: {n}Чорда прикасается к панели в поручне, и отражающее поле немедленно активируется. Вы слышите, как вдалеке звучат тревожные сирены. На лице Инцендии играет издевательская улыбка.{/n} "Дерзай, {name}. Дай мне повод".

{n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."
languages.original_text: {n}Чорда прикасается к панели в поручне, и отражающее поле немедленно активируется. Вы слышите, как вдалеке звучат тревожные сирены. На лице Инцендии играет издевательская улыбка.{/n} "Дерзай, {name}. Дай мне повод".

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅碰了一下宝座上的面板，整个宝座立刻被罩在了偏折力场里。你听到远处传来了警报声。她的脸上露出了嘲弄的笑容。{/n}“动手吧，{name}，给我一个杀你的理由。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅碰了一下宝座上的面板，整个宝座立刻被罩在了偏折力场里。你听到远处传来了警报声。她的脸上露出了嘲弄的笑容。{/n}“动手吧，{name}，给我一个杀你的理由。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアが王座の肘掛けにあるパネルをタッチすると、即座にリフラクター・フィールドで防御される。遠くで警告音が鳴り始める。小馬鹿にするような笑みが彼女の顔に浮かぶ。{/n}「さぁ、言うがいい、{name}。理由を言え」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアが王座の肘掛けにあるパネルをタッチすると、即座にリフラクター・フィールドで防御される。遠くで警告音が鳴り始める。小馬鹿にするような笑みが彼女の顔に浮かぶ。{/n}「さぁ、言うがいい、{name}。理由を言え」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia toca un panel del reposabrazos del trono e inmediatamente le protege un campo refractor. Se oyen alarmas a lo lejos. Una sonrisa burlona se dibuja en su rostro.{/n} «Adelante, {name}. Deme una razón».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia toca un panel del reposabrazos del trono e inmediatamente le protege un campo refractor. Se oyen alarmas a lo lejos. Una sonrisa burlona se dibuja en su rostro.{/n} «Adelante, {name}. Deme una razón».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia berührt ein Feld auf der Armlehne des Throns, der daraufhin sofort von einem Refraktorfeld umschlossen wird. Du hörst in der Ferne Alarmglocken schrillen. Ein spöttisches Lächeln erscheint auf ihrem Gesicht.{/n} "Nur zu, {name}. Gebt mir einen Grund."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia berührt ein Feld auf der Armlehne des Throns, der daraufhin sofort von einem Refraktorfeld umschlossen wird. Du hörst in der Ferne Alarmglocken schrillen. Ein spöttisches Lächeln erscheint auf ihrem Gesicht.{/n} "Nur zu, {name}. Gebt mir einen Grund."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia presse un bouton sur l'accoudoir de son trône, activant immédiatement un champ réfracteur. Vous entendez des alarmes se déclencher au loin. Un sourire moqueur apparaît sur son visage.{/n} « Allez-y, {name}. Je n'attends que ça. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia presse un bouton sur l'accoudoir de son trône, activant immédiatement un champ réfracteur. Vous entendez des alarmes se déclencher au loin. Un sourire moqueur apparaît sur son visage.{/n} « Allez-y, {name}. Je n'attends que ça. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın tahtın kolçağındaki bir panele dokunmasıyla etrafını bir ışıkkıran alanı sarıyor. İleride alarmların çalmaya başladığını duyuyorsun. Yüzüne alaycı bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Hiç durma {name}. Bana bir sebep sun."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance. A mocking smile cuts across her face.{/n} "Go ahead, {name}. Give me a reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia, tahtın kolçağındaki bir panele dokunuyor ve anında bir ışıkkıran alanıyla kaplanıyor. İleride alarmların çalmaya başladığını duyuyorsun. Yüzüne alaycı bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Hiç durma {name}. Bana bir mazeret ver."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
